plot: Gon decides to listen to the cassette tape found inside the small box.

Gon heard his father's message through the cassette tape. Gon and Killua grab some information about the memory card from the item box. Killua gets a lead from his brother about the game which is going to be presented in the auction, which will be held in Yorkshin City. The two leave Whale island and journey to Yorkshin City.
